evidence_extraction:
```json
{
  "tribal_dominance": [
    "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
    "Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community."
  ],
  "individual_dignity": [
    "Second-class citizenship is nothing but 20th slavery.",
    "We have injected ourselves into the civil rights struggle. And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights."
  ],
  "fear": [
    "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
    "We don't see any American dream. We've experienced only the American nightmare."
  ],
  "hope": [
    "And the only time – the only way we're going to solve our problem is with a self-help program.",
    "It will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years."
  ],
  "envy": [
    "The Man is becoming richer and richer, and you're becoming poorer and poorer.",
    "He got sense enough to look out for himself. It's you who don't have sense enough to look out for yourself."
  ],
  "compersion": [],
  "enmity": [
    "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
    "Anytime you have to rely upon your enemy for a job, you're in bad shape. When you — and he is your enemy."
  ],
  "amity": [
    "So I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony."
  ],
  "fragmentative_goals": [
    "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
    "Just as it took nationalism to remove colonialism from Asia and Africa, it'll take black nationalism today to remove colonialism from the backs and the minds of twenty-two million Afro-Americans here in this country."
  ],
  "cohesive_goals": [
    "So I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key.",
    "This is a philosophy that eliminates the necessity for division and argument, 'cause if you're black, you should be thinking black."
  ]
}
```
